channel.title: [ Just a little question ]

item.title: [ Just a little question ]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:6, topic:261528”]hitDiff = misc.random(25);

Is the damage, it is going to choose a number that is 0-25 as the hit.[/quote]That’s basically it. It uses a random method to choose an integer set from 0 to 25. That’s what chooses your splat number, hence your damage.

Read full topic

item.title: [ Just a little question ]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 2621 && misc.random(6)==1){ specialAtkNPC(true, 0, 600, 2836); hitDiff = misc.random(25); stillgfx(579, EnemyY, EnemyX);

if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 2621 && misc.random(6)==1){

means if the player’s shield is 2621, and if the number between a random choosing of 1-6 is 1, it will continue the method.

specialAtkNPC(true, 0, 600, 2836);

Basically you can look at the specialAtkNPC method to see what it does.

hitDiff = misc.random(25);

Is the damage, it is going to choose a number that is 0-25 as the hit.

stillgfx(579, EnemyY, EnemyX);

Is saying to activate the GFX 579, at the Enemy’s X and Y coordinate.

Read full topic

item.title: [ Just a little question ]
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

haha, also it might be saying if you are equiped shield 2621 and if misc random(6) ==1
then the specialAtkNPC(true, 0, 600, 2836); hitDiff = misc.random(25); stillgfx(579, EnemyY, EnemyX); will come into effect. But im not exactly sure what the misc.random is in this situation.

Read full topic

item.title: [ Just a little question ]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Hey, I was wondering if anyone could explain this code to me.

if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 2621 && misc.random(6)==1){ specialAtkNPC(true, 0, 600, 2836); hitDiff = misc.random(25); stillgfx(579, EnemyY, EnemyX);

The part that says:

misc.random(6)==1){

Does that mean that it is randomly activated once out of about 6 times?

Thanks!

Read full topic
